### Load the Data

```{r}
# Get file paths
full_table_path <- system.file("Data", "full_table.RData", package = "seesaw")
station_info_path <- system.file("Data", "station_info.RData", package = 
                                   "seesaw")
# Load the data file
load(full_table_path)
load(station_info_path)
```
